sources.title: Trapeze (1956) Burt Lancaster Â· Tony Curtis
sources.description: The story of two artists, locked in a life-or-death sworn conflict, between whom a woman forces herself. Initially, she tries to outwit them out of ambition, but ultimately falls in love with one of them. A melodramatic circus film, with a rather conventional love triangle, is captivating and entertaining thanks to the solid performances and, above all, the outstanding acrobatic scenes.

metadata.Plot: Mike Ribble was once a great trapeze artist - and the only the sixth to have completed a triple somersault - before his accident. Tino joins the circus, and manages to convince Mike to teach him the 'triple'. Meanwhile Lola, a tumbler, wants to get in on the act.
metadata.Writer: James R. Webb, Liam O'Brien, Max Catto
metadata.Actors: Burt Lancaster, Tony Curtis, Gina Lollobrigida
